alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 4:19AM EST until December 24 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Penobscot, Interior Hancock, Central Washington, Coastal Hancock and Coastal Washington Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Friday to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and powerlines. Numerous to widespread power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
